prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a sleek, segmented body and vibrant colors.
I want a Pokemon that combines elements of both insects and serpents, featuring striking patterns.
Generate an intimidating Pokemon with multiple legs, sharp horns, and a dark color palette.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a giant centipede, with bright red and purple accents.
Imagine a powerful bug-poison hybrid Pokemon that thrives in forest environments.
Design a fearsome Pokemon with a long, winding body and an aggressive stance.
Show me a Pokemon that has a unique blend of colors and a menacing appearance.

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Fast and agile, using speed to evade attacks and strike quickly.
